comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to The Day book. (Chicago, Ill.), 11 Jan. 1916. Last edition, page 31 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83045487/1916-01-11/ed-... the Noordam sailed from The Hague to New York in January 1916, with 50 student members of the Ford Peace party aboard. This could be some of them on arrival in New York.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for the information - I think you are correct, and we can add a few more details to this record.
